subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba, who had been recovering from an injury, entered in the 62nd minute with his team trailing, 1-0, and his arrival immediately lifted Ivory Coast.
snippet: Didier Drogba, who had been recovering from an injury, entered in the 62nd minute with his team trailing, 1-0, and his arrival immediately lifted Ivory Coast.
